description: WireSock VPN Gateway transforms the WireGuard Client for Windows into a full-fledged VPN server, enabling Windows machines to share their Internet/LAN connections with WireGuard clients. This innovative solution overcomes the lack of native server functionality in WireGuard for Windows, providing a user-friendly and efficient alternative to standard Windows Internet Connection Sharing for VPN server roles.
author: Vadim Smirnov
